Looking back on the #boro match, thought we did well. Didn't deserve to win. Definitely not expecting a win. Pleased with AK's flexibility

@smoggiec @brucierioch @burtyboro saying that... wrong move for him doesn't mean wrong move for the club, so I guess it's business vs sport.
@smoggiec @brucierioch @burtyboro I still think it would be a wrong move if he was a Geordie 😉 srsly tho, 2 years, yes, but not now.
@brucierioch @burtyboro @smoggiec doesn't matter how many games he played for us, people loved him, and then he was sold to a huge club
@brucierioch @burtyboro @smoggiec everybody hated Jones, but Turnbull came in, was amazing for us and sold straight away!
@brucierioch @burtyboro @smoggiec and I don't think he's had a good time, played regularly, but not played very well. Been found out a lot.
@brucierioch @burtyboro @smoggiec I don't really think the Stones move was good. He's only moved 3 places higher in the league! 😉
@brucierioch @burtyboro @smoggiec exactly, and you think Gibson would be fitst choice? No chance! They'd buy 2/3 players to be ahead of him.
@brucierioch @burtyboro @smoggiec they were God's blessing at the time. Especially Turnbull! Who else would you have picked?
@brucierioch @burtyboro @smoggiec Johnson had 2 good seasons then went to Sunderland. Fall from grace if there ever was one.
@brucierioch @burtyboro @smoggiec Jones was. Turnbull was. Now nowhere after going to L'pool & Chelsea as bench warmers.
@brucierioch @burtyboro @smoggiec just look at Turnbull, Brad Jones, Adam Johnson etc to see what happens when u leave for a big club
